source_sentence: 開元釋教錄略出卷第四
translation: Record of the Kaiyuan Translation of the Buddhist Scriptures, Abridged, Volume 4

source_sentence: 唐崇福寺沙門智昇撰
translation: Written by Zhisheng, the shaman of Chongfusi, Tang Dynasty

source_sentence: 四分律刪補隨機羯磨一卷唐崇義寺沙門釋道宣集四分僧羯磨三卷(題云羯磨卷上等出四分律)唐西太原寺沙門釋懷素依律集四分尼羯磨三卷(題云尼羯磨卷上等出四分律)唐西太原寺沙門釋懷素依律集出上三經七卷同帙計一百八十五紙　【入】。
translation: Sifen lu shanshan shibu kamo one volume tang chongyi si asa shi dao xuan ji si fengsheng kamo three volumes (titled kamo rolls on top of the four parts of the law) tang xitaiyuan si asa shi huaisu yi lu ji si fenni kamo three volumes (titled ni kamo rolls on top of the four parts of the law) tang xitaiyuan si asa shi huaisu yi luji jing shangsheng seven volumes in one book totaling one hundred and eighty-five pages [in].

source_sentence: 大愛道比丘尼經二卷(亦云大愛受戒經或直云大愛道經)失譯今僧祐錄云安公涼土異經今附北涼錄迦葉禁戒經一卷(一云摩訶比丘經亦直云真偽沙門經)宋居士沮渠京聲譯犯戒報應輕重經一卷(出目連問毘尼經或云目連問經)後漢安息三藏安世高譯戒銷災經一卷(或云戒伏銷災經)吳月支優婆塞支謙譯優婆塞五戒相經一卷(一名優婆塞五戒略論)宋罽賓三藏求那跋摩譯根本說一切有部毘奈耶頌三卷尊者毘舍佉造　唐三藏義淨譯根本說一切有部毘奈耶雜事攝頌一卷唐三藏義淨譯根本說一切有部毘柰耶尼陀那目得迦攝頌一卷唐三藏義淨譯五百問事經一卷失譯今附東晉上九經十二卷同帙計一百七十九紙　【奉】。
translation: The Mahāprajñāpāramitā-bhikṣuṇī-sūtra in two volumes (also called the Mahāprajñāpāramitā-bhikṣu-sūtra or simply the Mahāprajñāpāramitā-bhikṣu-sūtra) was lost in translation, and now the Saṃyuktâgama Record states that the scripture on the five precepts is a different scripture from the Liang land of Angong.

source_sentence: 根本薩婆多部律攝十四卷尊者勝友集唐天后代三藏義淨譯自二帙計二百七十五紙　【母】【儀】。
translation: Mūlasarvâstivāda-vinaya, fourteen volumes, collected by Venerable Jñānâbhibhū, translated by the Tang dynasty from the Tripiṭaka of the descendants of the Tang, in two volumes, totaling 275 pages [Mūlasarvâstivāda] [Yiyi].

source_sentence: 毘尼摩得勒伽一十卷宋天竺三藏僧伽跋摩譯自一帙計二百四紙　【諸】。
translation: The Ten Fascicle Collection of the Song Dynasty Tripiṭaka Saṃghabhadra Translated from the Original Sources into One Volume of Two Hundred and Four Pieces of Paper [Zhu].

source_sentence: 鼻柰耶律十卷(一名戒因緣經)姚秦涼州沙門竺佛念於符秦代譯(單本)自一帙計一百六十一紙　【姑】。
translation: Ten Fascicle Vinaya (a scripture on the causes and conditions of morality) translated by the Liangzhou monk Zhu Fonian in Fuqin during the Yao-Qin dynasty (single copy) in a single volume of 161 pages [g].

source_sentence: 善見律毘婆沙十八卷(或云毘婆娑律亦直云善見律)蕭齊外國沙門僧伽跋陀羅譯(單本)佛阿毘曇經二卷(亦云論)陳天竺三藏真諦譯上二經二十卷二帙計四百三十六紙　【伯】【叔】。
translation: Shanjian luvibhāsā 18 scrolls (also known as the vibhāṣā law, or simply Shanjian lu) translated by the foreign ascetic Saṃgabhadra of Xiaoqi (a single edition); the Buddha abhidharma sūtra 2 scrolls (also known as the treatise) translated by the Sanzang Zendi of Chen Tianzhu in the two preceding scriptures, 20 scrolls and 436 pages (a book of four hundred and thirty-six papers) [b] [u].

source_sentence: 毘尼母經八卷(亦云論)失譯今附秦錄(單本)大比丘三千威儀經二卷(亦云大僧威儀)後漢安息三藏安世高譯上二經十卷同帙計二百八紙　【猶】。
translation: The Sutra of the Mother of the Sarvâstivāda Bhikṣu's Three Thousand Regulations in Two Volumes (also called the Regulations of the Great Monk) was translated by An Shigao of the Later Han Dynasty Tripiṭaka into ten volumes of the above two sūtras, which comprise 288 pages [Yu].

source_sentence: 薩婆多毘尼婆沙九卷失譯今附三秦錄(單本)律二十二明了論一卷(亦直云明了論)陳天竺三藏真諦譯上二經十卷同帙計二百二十三紙　【子】。
translation: The nine lost volumes of the Sarvâstivāda Vinaya are now appended to the Sanqin Record (a single copy), the twenty-two Vinaya treatises in one volume (also known as the Vinaya Treatise), and the ten volumes of the above two scriptures translated by the Tripiṭaka of Chen Tianzhu, True Truth, which comprise two hundred and twenty-three pages in one volume [Zi].

source_sentence: 聲聞對法藏三十六部七十二帙此對法藏諸部不同。
translation: The śrāvakas' commentary on the Tripiṭaka of Dharma consists of thirty-six sections and seventy-two books, and this commentary on the Tripiṭaka of Dharma is different from the other sections.

source_sentence: 流布此方比言為眾。
translation: They're diffused here and there, and they're likened to many.

source_sentence: 今者據其有部根本。
translation: Now, according to this fundamental part of existence, the Body Treatise is the first and foremost treatise, followed by the Second Treatise.

source_sentence: 身論為初足論居次。
translation: The Body Treatise is the first and the Foot Treatise is the second.

source_sentence: 毘婆沙等支派編末。
translation: The Vibhāṣā council and other schools are numbered last.

source_sentence: 餘部既眾難以科條。
translation: Since there are so many other schools, it's difficult to define them.

source_sentence: 以俟將來無先後。
translation: We'll wait until the future when there's no precedence.

source_sentence: 阿毘曇八揵度論三十迦旃延子造　符秦罽賓三藏僧伽提婆共竺佛念譯自三帙計四百七十一紙　【比】【兒】【孔】。
translation: The Abhidharma-jñānaprasthāna-śāstra was produced by Kātyāyanīputra, a translator of the Sanskrit Tripiṭaka of Fuqin, Saṃghadeva, and Zhu Fonian from three books totaling 471 pages [Bi] [Er] [Kong].

source_sentence: 阿毘達磨發智論二十卷迦多衍尼子造　唐三藏玄奘譯(南藏云出內典錄)自二帙計三百七十四紙　【懷】【兒】。
translation: Abhidharma prajñāpti-pāramitā-śāstra, 20 volumes, translated by Xuanzang of the Tang Tripiṭaka (Nanzang Yun's Commentary on the Internal Canon), in two parts, totaling 374 pages [Huai] [Er].

source_sentence: 阿毘達磨法蘊足論十二卷尊者大採菽氏造　唐三藏玄奘譯(出內典單本)自一帙計二百七紙　【弟】。
translation: Abhidharma prajñāpti-pāda, a twelve-fascicle work by the Venerable Daciaṃkāśyapa, translated by Xuanzang of the Tang Dynasty (from the monographs of the Saṃdhinirmocana) in one volume of two hundred and seventy-one pages [Dīr].

source_sentence: 阿毘達磨集異門足論二十卷尊者舍利子說唐三藏玄奘譯(出內典錄單本)自二帙計二百八十四紙　【同】【氣】。
translation: The Abhidharmajñānaprasthāna-pāda-śāstra, in twenty volumes, was translated by Venerable Śāriputra from the Tang Tripiṭaka and Xuanzang (from the monographs of the Internal Canon) into two volumes of two hundred and eighty-four pages [of the same text].

source_sentence: 施設足論有一萬八千頌尊者大迦多衍那造(迦多此云翦剃衍此云蘇那是男婆羅門中一種○其論未譯)上三足論並佛在世時造。
translation: There are 18,000 verses in the Prajñāpti-pādaśāstra, which was produced by Venerable Kātyāyanīputra (Kātyāyanīputra, Kātyāyanīputra, and Suna, a type of male Brahmans).

source_sentence: 阿毘達磨識身足論十六卷唐三藏玄奘譯(出內典錄單本)阿毘達磨界身足論三卷唐三藏玄奘譯上三論十九卷二帙計三百一十三紙　【連】【枝】。
translation: The Sixteen-fascicle Abhidharma Treatise on the Body of Consciousness was translated by Xuanzang of the Tang Canon (from the single copy of the Internal Canon), and the Thirty-four-fascicle Treatise on the Body of the World was translated by Xuanzang of the Tang Canon into nineteen volumes and two books of three hundred and thirteen pages.

source_sentence: 阿毘達磨品類足論十八卷唐三藏玄奘譯(出內典錄)眾事分阿毘曇論十二卷右二論同本異譯宋天竺三藏求那跋陀羅共菩提耶舍譯(第一譯)上二論三十卷三帙計四百七十九紙　【交】【友】【投】。
translation: The Abhidharma-prakaraṇapāda-śāstra, in its eighteen volumes, was translated by Xuanzang of the Tang Tripiṭaka (from the Internal Canon), and the twelve volumes of the Abhidharma-prakaraṇapāda-śāstra, in its twelve right-hand two volumes, were translated from the same text by Qunabhadra and Bodhiyaśas of the Song Dynasty Tripiṭaka (the first translation), and the thirty volumes and three books of the above two treatises contain four hundred and seventy-nine sheets of paper.

source_sentence: 阿毘曇毘婆沙論八十二卷(或六十卷)北涼浮陀跋摩共道泰譯自八帙計一千四百四紙　【分】【切】【磨】【箴】【規】【仁】【慈】【隱】。
translation: The Abhidharma-mahāvibhāṣā-śāstra is an eighty-two-volume (or sixty-volume) translation by Bhūtôttaravādin and Dōtai of the Northern Liang Dynasty, consisting of eight volumes and fourteen pages [divided] [cut] [grammar] [proscription] [rule] [benevolence] [compassion] [concealment].

source_sentence: 阿毘達磨大毘婆沙論二百卷唐三藏玄奘譯自二十帙計三千一百六十八紙　【惻】【造】【次】【弗】【離】【節】【義】【廉】【退】【顛】【沛】【匪】【虧】【性】【靜】【情】【逸】【心】【動】【神】。
translation: The 200-volume Abhidharma-mahāvibhāṣā-śāstra is a translation by the Tang tripiṭaka Xuanzang from 20 books totaling 3,168 pages [comprehension] [creation] [order] [suppression] [separation] [moderation] [meaning] [refutation] [retrogression] [subversion] [pui] [bandit] [deficiency] [nature] [quiescence] [emotion] [escape] [mind] [movement] [spirit].

source_sentence: 阿毘達磨俱舍釋論二十二卷婆藪槃豆造　陳天竺三藏真諦譯(第一譯)阿毘達磨俱舍本論頌一卷尊者世親造　唐三藏玄奘譯(出內典錄○第一譯○真諦譯者闕本)上二論二十三卷二帙計五百一十八紙　【疲】【守】。
translation: Abhidharma-kauśalya-śāstra, twenty-two volumes, Vasubandhu's translation (the first translation), one volume of verses from the Abhidharma-kauśalya-śāstra, His Holiness Shihchin's translation, and Xuanzang's translation of the Tang Tripiṭaka (from the Inner Canon, the first translation, and the missing translation from the True Truth), the above two treatises in twenty-three volumes and two books totaling five hundred and eighteen pages.

source_sentence: 阿毘達磨俱舍論三十卷尊者世親造　唐三藏玄奘譯(出內典錄○第二譯)自三帙計四百七十九紙　【真】【志】【滿】。
translation: The 30-fascicle Abhidharma-kauśalya-śāstra is a translation of the Tang Tripiṭaka by Xuanzang (from the second translation in the Inner Canon), consisting of three books and 479 pages [True] [Zhi] [Pūrṇa].

source_sentence: 阿毘達磨順正理論八十卷尊者眾賢造　唐三藏玄奘譯(出內典錄四單本)自八帙計一千四百二十三紙　【逐】【物】【意】【移】【堅】【持】【雅】【操】。
translation: Abhidharma shunzheng lun 80 scrolls, made by the Venerable Zongxian, translated by Xuanzang of the Tang Tri-Cang (from the four separate translations of the Inner Canon), consisting of 1,423 pages in eight parts [of the text] [of the matter] [of the mind] [of the transference] [of [the firmness] [of the maintenance] [of [the elegance] [of the conduct].

source_sentence: 阿毘達磨顯宗論四十卷尊者眾賢造　唐三藏玄奘譯(出內典錄)自四帙計六百四十四紙　【好】【爵】【自】【縻】。
translation: Forty Fascicle Treatise on the Revealing of the Abhidharma School (translated by Xuanzang of the Tang Tri-Cang (from the Internal Canon)) in four parts, totaling 644 pages [Good] [Sir] [Self] [Setting].

source_sentence: 阿毘曇心論四卷(或無論字)尊者法勝造　東晉罽賓三藏瞿曇僧伽提婆譯法勝阿毘曇心論六卷大德優波扇多造　高齊天竺三藏那連提耶舍共法智譯上二論十卷同帙計一百八十一紙　【都】。
translation: Four Fascicle Treatise on the Abhidharma Mind (or whatever its title is), translated by Venerable Fasheng. Six Fascicle Treatise on the Abhidharma Mind by Gautama Saṃghadeva, from the Sanzang of Kāśyapa, in Kāśyapa, in India, and ten fascicles of the above two treatises, totaling one hundred and eighty-one pages [Du].

source_sentence: 雜阿毘曇心論十一卷(亦三雜毘曇毘婆沙)尊者法救造　宋天竺三藏僧伽跋摩等譯阿毘曇甘露味論一卷(或云甘露味阿毘曇)尊者瞿沙造　曹魏代譯失三藏名隨相論二卷(或云求那摩諦相隨論)德惠法師造　陳天竺三藏真諦譯上三論一十五卷二帙計三百七十二紙　【邑】【華】。
translation: Saṃyuktâbhidharma-hṛdaya-śāstra, 11 volumes (also Saṃyuktâbhidharma-hṛdaya-śāstra); Saṃghabharma and Saṃghabhidharma-hṛdaya-śāstra, 1 volume (or Saṃghabhidharma-hṛdaya-śāstra); Saṃghabharma-hṛdaya-śāstra, 2 volumes (or Saṃghabhidharma-hṛdaya-śāstra); Tejorâbhidharma-hṛdaya-śāstra, 15 volumes (or Saṃghabhidharma-hṛdaya-śāstra); Saṃghabharma-hṛdaya-śāstra, 3 volumes (or Saṃghabhidharma-hṛdaya-śāstra)

source_sentence: 尊婆須蜜菩薩所集論十卷尊者婆須蜜造　符秦罽賓三藏僧伽跋澄等譯三法度論三卷(或云經或二卷)東晉罽賓三藏瞿曇僧伽提婆譯入阿毘達磨論二卷塞建地羅漢造　唐三藏玄奘譯(出內典錄)上三論十五卷二帙計三百四十九紙　【夏】【東】。
translation: Ten Fascicle Treatise on the Collection of the Bodhisattva Vasumitra (Venerable Vasumitra) Translated by Saṃghabhadra and Others from the Tripiṭaka of Kapphiṇḍa, Fuqin, Three Fathoms Treatise, Three Fascicle Treatise (either a scripture or two fascicles) Translated by Saṃghadeva from the Tripiṭaka of Kapphiṇḍa, Dongjin, Two Fascicle Treatise on the Entry into Abhidharma, Constructed by the Tang Tripiṭaka Xuanzang (from the Internal Canon), Upper Three Fathoms Treatise, Fifteen Fascicle Treatise, Two Fascicle Treatise, Three Hundred and Forty-nine Pieces of Paper [Xia] [Dong].

source_sentence: 成實論二十卷(有二百三品)阿梨跋摩造　姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯自二帙計四百一十一紙　【西】【二】。
translation: Chengshi lun (Chengshi lun) 20 rolls (with 233 chapters), translated by Ari Varma from the Yaoqin Tripiṭaka into two books totaling 411 pages [West] [2].

source_sentence: 立世阿毘曇論十卷(或無論字)陳天竺三藏真諦譯自一帙計一百七十紙　【京】。
translation: Lishiapitan lun 10 scrolls (or whatever the title is) translated by Chen Tianzhu Sanzang Zendi from one volume containing 170 pages [Jings].

source_sentence: 解脫道論十二卷梁扶南三藏僧伽婆羅譯自一帙計一百一紙　【背】。
translation: Twelve Fascicle Treatise on the Way to Liberation Translated by the Liang Funan Tripiṭaka Saṃghabhara in One Volume on One Hundred and One Sheets [Backside].

source_sentence: 舍利弗阿毘曇論二十二卷姚秦罽賓三藏曇摩耶舍共曇摩崛多譯五事毘婆沙論二卷(亦云阿毘達磨五事論)尊者法救造　唐三藏玄奘譯(出翻經圖)上二論二十五卷自二帙計四百七十八紙　【邙】【面】。
translation: The Śāriputrâbhidharma-śāstra in twenty-two volumes was translated by the Yaoqin Tri Tripiṭaka of Kāśmāyā and the Dharmagupta in five matters in two volumes (also called the five matters of the Abhidharma-śāstra) by the Venerable Fasai.

source_sentence: 鞞婆沙論十四卷(亦名鞞婆沙阿毘曇論)阿羅漢尸陀槃尼撰　符秦罽賓三藏僧伽跋澄譯三彌底部論三卷(或無部字○或四卷○三彌紙此云正量即正量部中論也)失譯今附秦錄上二論十七卷二帙計三百八十五紙　【洛】【浮】。
translation: Vibhāṣā-śāstra 14 vols. (also called Vibhāṣā-abhidharma), written by Śītapāṇī, the Arhat, translated by Saṃghabhadra, the Tripiṭaka of Kāśmīra, into three volumes of the Samīdhi-śāstra (either without the Sanskrit phoneme Ṛ or in four volumes Ṛ Samīdhi-śāstra), which was lost in translation.

source_sentence: 分別功德論三卷(或云經)失譯在後漢錄四諦論四卷婆藪跋摩造　陳天竺三藏真諦譯辟支佛因緣論一卷(或二卷)失譯今附秦錄十八部論一卷新為失譯附三秦錄(第一譯)部執異論一卷(一名部異執論)陳天竺三藏真諦譯(第二譯)異部宗輪論一卷世友菩薩造　唐三藏玄奘譯(出翻經圖)上六論十一卷同帙計一百九十七紙　【渭】。
translation: The Discriminating Qualities Treatise is a three-volume work (or sūtra) that was lost in translation and was translated into four volumes in the Latter Han period (Lhasaṃbhoga).

source_sentence: 有譯有本錄中聖賢傳記錄第二(一百八部五百四十一卷五十七帙梵本翻譯集傳六十八部一百七十三卷)佛所行讚經傳五卷(亦云佛本行經)　馬鳴菩薩撰北涼天竺三藏曇無讖譯佛本行經一卷(一名佛本行讚傳)宋涼州沙門釋寶雲譯上二集十二卷同帙計二百一十五紙　【據】。
translation: There is a translation of the second record of the biographies of the sages in the Yuben List (one hundred and eight parts, five hundred and forty-one volumes, and fifty-seven books), a collection of sixty-eight parts and one hundred and seventy-three volumes in the Sanskrit translation, and a five-volume biography of the Buddhacarita (also called the Sutra of the Past Activities of the Buddha), which was written by Ma Ming Bodhisattva and translated into one volume by Tan Wuzang of Tianzang in Northern Liang (a biography of the Past Activities of the Buddha).

source_sentence: 撰集百緣經十卷吳月支優婆塞支謙譯(出內典錄)自一帙計一百五十二紙　【涇】。
translation: Compilation of Ten Fascicles of the Sutra on the Hundred Conditions: Translated by Wu Yuezhi Upasai Zhi Qian (from the Internal Canon) in One Volume, Containing One Hundred and Fifty-two Pieces of Paper [涇].

source_sentence: 出曜經二十卷(或云論)姚秦涼州沙門竺佛念於符秦代譯賢愚經十三卷(出翻經圖或十五卷或六卷或十卷)元魏涼州沙門惠覺等在高昌郡譯上二經三十三卷四帙計七百九十七紙　【宮】【殿】【盤】【欝】。

source_sentence: 下六卷是無盡意阿耨達龍王經二卷　與藏中弘道廣顯三昧經文全同合道神足經三卷　與藏中道神足無極變化文句全同哀泣經三卷　與藏中方等般泥洹文句全同寶思慧印三昧經一卷　與藏中惠印三昧文句全同鹿子經一卷　與藏中鹿母經文句全同小無量壽經一卷　與藏中阿彌陀經文句全同胎藏經一卷　與藏中無垢質女經文句全同聞城十二因緣經一卷　與藏中貝多樹下思惟十二因緣經文句全同大安般經一卷　與藏中大安般守意經上卷全同申日經一卷　與藏中月光童子經文全同轉輪五道罪福報應經一卷　與藏中罪福報應經文全同旃陀越經一卷　與藏中旃陀越國王經文句全同真偽沙門經一卷　與藏中迦葉禁經文句全同轉法輪經一卷　檢諸藏中本並是轉法輪其轉法輪經與此全同賓頭盧為王說法經一卷　與藏中賓頭廬突羅闍為優陀延王說法文句全同阿蘭若習禪法經二卷　與藏中坐禪三昧經文全同禪祕要經五卷　檢諸藏中本文極交錯。
translation: 下六卷是無盡意阿耨達龍王經二卷　與藏中弘道廣顯三昧經文全同合道神足經三卷　與藏中道神足無極變化文句全同哀泣經三卷　與藏中方等般泥洹文句全同寶思慧印三昧經一卷　與藏中惠印三昧文句全同鹿子經一卷　與藏中鹿母經文句全同小無量壽經一卷　與藏中阿彌陀經文句全同胎藏經一卷　與藏中無垢質女經文句全同聞城十二因緣經一卷　與藏中貝多樹下思惟十二因緣經文句全同大安般經一卷　與藏中大安般守意經上卷全同申日經一卷　與藏中月光童子經文全同轉輪五道罪福報應經一卷　與藏中罪福報應經文全同旃陀越經一卷　與藏中旃陀越國王經文句全同真偽沙門經一卷　與藏中迦葉禁經文句全同轉法輪經一卷　檢諸藏中本並是轉法輪其轉法輪經與此全同賓頭盧為王說法經一卷　與藏中賓頭廬突羅闍為優陀延王說法文句全同阿蘭若習禪法經二卷　與藏中坐禪三昧經文全同禪祕要經五卷　檢諸藏中本文極交錯。

source_sentence: 虛空藏所問經八卷　是大集經虛空藏品全一品虛空藏菩薩所問持經得幾福經一卷　即是抄前虛空藏品大方廣如來性起微密藏經二卷　是舊華嚴經寶王如來性起全一品隨願往生經一卷　是灌頂經第一十一卷舊藥師經一卷　佛遊維耶離者是灌頂經第十二卷密迹金剛力士經二卷增一阿含經一卷　出增一阿含經第二十一卷行七行現報經一卷　出增一阿含經第三十四卷十二因緣經一卷　出增一阿含經第四十六卷戒相應法經一卷　出雜阿含經第三十卷比丘問佛多優婆塞命終經一卷　亦出雜阿含經第三十卷獨富長者經一卷　出阿含第四十六卷有眾生三世作惡經一卷　出出曜經第八卷出家功德經一卷　佛在迦蘭陀竹園者抄賢愚經出家功德品右從虛空藏下。
